message: I propose a 60/40 split. Let's end this quickly and take our share!
Let's split it equally. This way we both receive a fair amount. Considering the inflation it's better than gaining less in further rounds.
Okay, Bob, things are getting tight with inflation. I'll offer a slightly more generous split to get this done. 55/45 is the best we can do at this point.
Inflation is really cutting into our potential gains. It's better to settle this round. I am willing to take the smaller cut.
Alright Bob, let's finally end this! We both get half. I understand the inflation, but it's still a fair split, considering our time.
